_comment: Weights for Wordle Solver recommendation scoring

_description.green: Letter confirmed in correct position (high value)
_description.yellow: Letter confirmed but position unknown (medium value)
_description.unused: New letter not yet tried (high value for exploration)
_description.exploration: Bonus multiplier for unused letters in rounds 1-3
_description.duplicate_penalty: Penalty multiplier for duplicate letters in rounds 1-3

_tuning_notes: Increase exploration/unused for more aggressive exploration. Increase duplicate_penalty to strongly discourage repeats in early rounds.
